page.title: 20LIVING IN SHAPINSAY
page.content:
{Living}in{Shapinsay}is good because the roads are quiet and children can go out on their bikes. We know everybody and people wave or stop to speak as they pass. There is{no pollution}in the air, so it is a{healthy}place to live. To pass the time we play at the swings and chutes.Sometimes we walk along the shores or over the fields.
{These pages were written by:
P7 John Clarke,Stephen Crew, Kevin Gray,Stephen Pratt. P6 Leon Cooper,Victoria Hess, Andrea Nicolson,Cindy Spence, Jacqueline Sutherland. P5 Trevor Leslie,Christopher Muir, Sonia Crew,Linette Meason,Sinead Taylor.
